title: Worst thing you've ever stolen?
body:
I'm not a thief, so... the worst and only thing I've ever stolen was a cat. 
well... two cats. not at the same time but a couple years apart. 
one was from the pound for a friend's birthday and one was from a house full of feral cats(20 to 30 cats maybe) that were not spayed or neutered. 

How about you, GD? what have you stolen?
